levels.description: Buffs all allies within range immediately, restoring HP by <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of Gavial's ATK (by <@ba.vup>{heal_scale_2:0%}</> of Gavial's ATK when the target's HP is lower than 50%) per second, lasting <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
